title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 1720/83 of 2 June 1983 on the application of Decision No 1/83 of the EEC-Iceland Joint Committee further amending Article 8 of Protocol 3 concerning the definition of the concept of ' originating products' and methods of administrative cooperation
header:
( 1 ) OJ NO L 301 , 31 . 12 . 1972 , P . 2 .
COUNCIL REGULATION ( EEC ) NO 1720/83 OF 2 JUNE 1983 ON THE APPLICATION OF DECISION NO 1/83 OF THE EEC-ICELAND JOINT COMMITTEE FURTHER AMENDING ARTICLE 8 OF PROTOCOL 3 CONCERNING THE DEFINITION OF THE CONCEPT OF " ORIGINATING PRODUCTS " AND METHODS OF ADMINISTRATIVE COOPERATION
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
DECISION NO 1/83 OF THE EEC-ICELAND JOINT COMMITTEE SHALL APPLY IN THE COMMUNITY .
THE TEXT OF THE DECISION IS ANNEXED TO THIS REGULATION .

THIS REGULATION SHALL ENTER INTO FORCE ON THE THIRD DAY FOLLOWING ITS PUBLICATION IN THE OFFICIAL JOURNAL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES .
THIS REGULATION SHALL BE BINDING IN ITS ENTIRETY AND DIRECTLY APPLICABLE IN ALL MEMBER STATES .
attachments:
DONE AT LUXEMBOURG , 2 JUNE 1983 .
FOR THE COUNCIL
THE PRESIDENT
N . BLUEM
